question: During whose reign among the following Qubacha (slave of Muizzudin) declared himself an independent ruler of Multan and seized Lahore and parts of the punjab ? -
explanation: Qubacha , a fellow slave of Aibak , had declared himself an independent ruler , during the reign of Iltutmish . Also at the time of Iltutmish accession , Ali Mardan Khan declared himself the king of Bengal and Bihar and Rajputs also took control of Kalinjar , Gwalior and the entire eastern Rajasthan , including Ajmer and Bayana.
